tests.name: Left Customer-Order
tests.input:
create database LeftCustomerorder
use database LeftCustomerorder

CREATE TABLE Customers (Customerid INT PRIMARY KEY, CustomerName VARCHAR(100), ZIPCODE INT)
insert into Customers (Customerid, CustomerName, ZIPCODE) values (1,'Rick',90091), (3,'CG',90083), (4,'Savya',90080), (6,'Tom',90096), (7,'Lucy',90098), (9,'Patricia',90089),(10,'Barbara',90095)

CREATE TABLE Orders (Orderid INT PRIMARY KEY, Customerid INT, OrderAmount INT)
insert into Orders (Orderid, Customerid, OrderAmount) values (1, 4, 200), (2, 9, 1000), (9, 6, 300), (10, 10, 40000), (15,3, 500)

select CustomerName, ZIPCODE, OrderAmount from Customers left join Orders on Orders.Orderid = Customers.Customerid
quit

tests.name: Right Customer-Order
tests.input:
create database LeftCustomerorder
use database LeftCustomerorder

CREATE TABLE Customers (Customerid INT PRIMARY KEY, CustomerName VARCHAR(100), ZIPCODE INT)
insert into Customers (Customerid, CustomerName, ZIPCODE) values (1,'Rick',90091), (3,'CG',90083), (4,'Savya',90080), (6,'Tom',90096), (7,'Lucy',90098), (9,'Patricia',90089),(10,'Barbara',90095)

CREATE TABLE Orders (Orderid INT PRIMARY KEY, Customerid INT, OrderAmount INT)
insert into Orders (Orderid, Customerid, OrderAmount) values (1, 4, 200), (2, 9, 1000), (9, 6, 300), (10, 10, 40000), (15,3, 500)

select CustomerName, ZIPCODE, OrderAmount from Customers right join Orders on Orders.Orderid = Customers.Customerid
quit
